name: Association game
short_description:
The Association game is a program arising from the desire to organize playing associations game for students in class . Playing this game make revising knowledge and lessons more interesting.

This is a popular game that is familiar to everyone from many quiz shows.

In the game, students opens the fields, and on the base of the words, which are located inside the fields, try to guess the words that are answers in the columns, and the final answer.

The basic functions of the program are:
- Ability to create a series of associations
- Ability to edit already created associations
- Ability to save associations in to file
- Reading associations from the file
- Display association
- Print the associations on paper

The program can be used on both, Windows and Linux platforms.
